[DIRECT] Follow @fhollande's speech during his visit to Arc, the world's leading manufacturer of glassware https://t.co/I0zeaVHvBj
"I came to the region a few weeks ago before dismantling the Lande camp" @fhollande #DirectPR
"Today the camp was evacuated and this allowed to receive these refugees in dignified reception centers" "@fhollande #DirectPR
"I came to Liévin also for the laying of the foundation stone of the reserves of @MuseeLouvreLens" @fhollande #DirectPR
"And I'm coming back today to Arques, a world famous city thanks to your company Arc" @fhollande #DirectPR
"In 2014 the question arose as to whether the company would survive, it was necessary to find a buyer" @fhollande #DirectPR
"The state has taken responsibility by fetching a buyer, believing that it was impossible to let jobs disappear"
"The solution was to find a new shareholder but it also took a financial effort" @fhollande #DirectPR
"PHP the buyer has invested € 85 million, the banks have cleared 90% of the debt and the state has granted a loan of € 49 million"
"If there were no more state, officials in the state, who would have taken that responsibility?" @fhollande #DirectPR
"It's because there was a gathering of all forces, investors, employees, state, that you managed" @fhollande #DirectPR
"You talk today of recruitments when we spoke yesterday of dismissals" @fhollande #DirectPR
"Employees who started young and have paid enough should be able to retire, it will be imaginative"
"That's also why it was important to recognize the hard work in calculating pensions" @fhollande #DirectPR
"To those who want to put customs barriers everywhere, you have to ask: who would we sell to? We need to export" #DirectPR
Block # The House of Representatives meets the Prime Minister https://t.co/xQkz8Gmier
"The big question is how to finance a company like yours, you have to go through the Caisse des dépôts, the @Bpifrance"
"The future of Arc is the future of the entire region.You represent a quarter of salaried employment in the territory of Saint-Omer" #DirectPR
"When I arrived in 2012, I noticed the state of disrepair of the industry and the social plans that had been retained so far"
"Here the #CICE and the pact of responsibility counted, without it there would have been no taker" @fhollande #DirectPR
"We must continue to support the innovation that is developing here and everywhere in France" @fhollande #DirectPR
"We are in a pivotal moment for Arc, the company is saved, we must succeed the next step with new investments"
"France when it fights and finds solutions, when the state does its duty, it wins and you won" @fhollande #DirectPR
"Arc is today a flagship and a reference" @fhollande #DirectPR
